>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/recurring-payments/cart/calculate"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>




## 부가설명 및 특이사항
장바구니에서 선택된 상품만 계산하여 금액만 리턴하는 API 입니다.

아래 화면예시에서 상품/옵션별 배송비는 업데이트(재계산)하지 못합니다.

cartNo 파라미터 자체를 넘기지 않는 경우 : 장바구니 전체

cartNo 에 빈 값을 넘기는 경우 : 0원        

## 화면예시
[![](http://image.toast.com/aaaaahb/api-description/order/cart/[GET]%20cart_calculate%20%EC%9E%A5%EB%B0%94%EA%B5%AC%EB%8B%88%20%EC%84%A0%ED%83%9D%20%EA%B3%84%EC%82%B0.png?autox150)](http://image.toast.com/aaaaahb/api-description/order/cart/[GET]%20cart_calculate%20%EC%9E%A5%EB%B0%94%EA%B5%AC%EB%8B%88%20%EC%84%A0%ED%83%9D%20%EA%B3%84%EC%82%B0.png)

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={[{"name":"cartNo","in":"query","description":"선택된 장바구니 번호","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"1,2,3"},{"name":"divideInvalidProducts","in":"query","description":"구매하지 못하는 상품 분할여부","required":false,"schema":{"type":"boolean"},"example":"true"},{"name":"Version","in":"header","description":"API 버전","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"1.0"},{"name":"clientId","in":"header","description":"쇼핑몰 클라이언트 아이디","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"test-client-id"},{"name":"platform","in":"header","description":"클라이언트 플랫폼 (PC, MOBILE_WEB, AOS, IOS)","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"PC"},{"name":"language","in":"header","description":"언어 (기본 값: ko)","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"ko"},{"name":"accessToken","in":"header","description":"회원 엑세스 토큰","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"test-access-token"},{"name":"Shop-By-Authorization","in":"header","description":"액세스 토큰(Oauth2 스펙)","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"Bearer test-access-token"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"200","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"buyAmt":{"type":"number","description":"구매금액 합","example":0},"discountAmt":{"type":"number","description":"할인금액","example":0},"totalAmt":{"type":"number","description":"총 구매금액 합(구매금액 합 + 총 선불배송비 합)","example":0},"accumulationAmtWhenBuyConfirm":{"type":"number","description":"구매확정 시 적립금 합","example":0},"standardAmt":{"type":"number","description":"정상금액(상품판매가 + 옵션추가금액) * 주문수량","example":0},"totalPayOnDeliveryAmt":{"type":"number","description":"총 착불배송비 합","example":0},"totalDeliveryAmt":{"type":"number","description":"총 배송비 합","example":0},"totalPrePaidDeliveryAmt":{"type":"number","description":"총 선불배송비 합","example":0}},"description":"","title":"cart-calculate-1315479487"},"examples":{"get-recurring-payments-cart-calculate":{"value":"{\"buyAmt\":13500,\"accumulationAmtWhenBuyConfirm\":500,\"standardAmt\":15000,\"discountAmt\":1500,\"totalDeliveryAmt\":7500,\"totalPrePaidDeliveryAmt\":0,\"totalPayOnDeliveryAmt\":7500,\"totalAmt\":13500}"}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
